title: How to Post a Blog
content:
Step-by-Step to Publish a New Blog

Follow these steps to add your own post to this blog system.

1. Prepare Your Post Content

Write your blog content using standard HTML. You can use headers, paragraphs, lists, and even code blocks like below:

// Example content section
<h2>My Journey to 1000 in Bullet Chess</h2>
<p>After lots of blunders, I finally made it!</p>

2. Save as a JSON File

Use this structure for your blog file (e.g., how-to-post.json):

{
  "id": "how-to-post",
  "title": "üìù How to Post a Blog",
  "date": "2025-06-01",
  "tags": ["guide", "blog"],
  "wordCount": 198,
  "readTime": 1,
  "image": "./assets/images/howtopost.png",
  "content": "...HTML content here..."
}

3. Add it to index.json

Finally, open posts/index.json and add the new entry:

{
  "id": "how-to-post",
  "title": "üìù How to Post a Blog",
  "date": "2025-06-01",
  "tags": ["guide", "blog"],
  "wordCount": 198,
  "readTime": 1,
  "image": "./assets/images/howtopost.png"
}

Once saved, refresh your page and your post will appear!
